All Classes

  • Class Description
    AccessPoint
    This class offers the callBack method to allow the server to expose some of his method.
    ActionStructure
    A structure to incapsulate the single action with its flag.
    Adrenalin
    The enum for the adrenalin states.
    Ammo
    Interface for ammo.
    AmmoCube
    Implementation of Ammo for the AmmoCube.Represents the physical ammo cube.
    AmmoTile
    Implementation of Card interface fot representing the ammo tiles.
    AmmoTile.AmmoTileBuilder  
    AmmoTilesDeck
    The class for the deck of AmmoTiles.
    AmmoTilesDeck.AmmoTilesDeckBuilder  
    AtomicDamage
    The Damage atomic Effect.
    AtomicEffect
    An atomic effect is the smallest effect that can be applied.
    AtomicMark
    The Mark atomic effect.
    AtomicMove
    The Move atomic effect.
    AtomicType
    An enum to differentiate effects directly.
    Board
    The board class.
    Board.BoardBuilder  
    BoardDrawer
    Class responsible of analyzing the JsonObject of the board that arrives from the server and building the Strings that will be printed by the Terminal class.
    BoardFunction
    This class implements some of the functions needed by the board such as placing the weapons in the right place and calculating the right distance
    BoardScreen
    main screen of the gui in which the board is created and all the nodes are initialized.
    BoardVoteException  
    Bridge
    Main class for storing all the damages , marks , kills and possible actions of the linked player.
    ButtonPowerUp
    button for showing and implementing power up features
    ButtonSquare
    Square button for expressing particular square features
    ButtonWeapon
    weapon button for expressing particular weapon features in a button node
    Card
    Card interface with basic methods declaration for the "card" object.
    CardException
    An Exception related to the Card class.
    CardHandler
    Class for showing all the cards information
    CardinalException
    It is thrown when two target that should be in a cardinal directions, are not.
    CardNotFoundException
    An Exception that is mainly thrown when someone is searching a card that is not present in the place where it is being searched.
    CardNotLoadedException
    It is thrown when the card that the user is trying to use is not loaded.
    Client
    This is the main class of the client.
    ClientHandler
    A class that offers static methods to handle the clients of the server and their messages.
    Color
    This enumeration links the every character name, with a string containing its color and the ansi code corresponding to the color.
    ColorException
    An exception that is thrown every time something related to the Color class goes wrong: wrong calls, wrong conversions.
    Connection
    Enumeration to represent the idea of connection between squares.
    ConsoleView
    The cli implementation for the View.
    Cost
    Class that offers a static method to support the cost checking action.
    CostException
    It is thrown either when the reload cost is too high for the player (he doesn't have enough resources to pay) or when the player can't afford the cost of the effect.
    Deaths
    main class for storing the kill streak of all the game among with the player's color who did the kill shot
    Direction
    Enumeration for the four cardinal directions.
    DuplicateException
    It is thrown when there are too many targets in the target list, so the effect cannot be executed.
    Effect
    This class represents the effect of a Card or an action.
    Effect.EffectBuilder  
    EffectArgument
    This class hold all the information needed to execute an effect, in every possible case.
    EffectCallException
    It is thrown when someone's trying to execute a wrong effect.
    EffectException
    An effect related to the Effect class.
    EffectHandler
    This class executes the effect.
    EffectNotActivatedException
    It is thrown when someone is trying to execute an effect that has not been activated.
    EffectType
    Enum to differentiate effects directly.
    EffectTypeException
    It is thrown when someone is trying to execute an effect that has a different type from the possible ones..
    EffectUsedException  
    EmptySquareException
    It is thrown when someone's searching a Card in a Square that is empty.
    EndGameException
    An exception that is thrown only once in the game, when, during the "endOfTurn" method in the gameHandler, the game ends.
    EndGameScreen
    Final screen in which the chart is shown.
    Explosion
    explosion animation caused when the background is clicked
    FullHandException
    It is thrown when the player's trying to collect a card without discarding one and he already have three cards in his hand
    GameButton
    button that has particular graphics.
    GameHandler
    This class is responsible of furthering the game.
    GameListScreen
    Screen for choosing the game to join or creating a new game.
    GameNotStartedScreen
    Screen for voting the main board and for waiting other players to join the game
    GUIPreloader
    preloader class for loading all the needed images in the ram
    GUIView
    main class for the gui .this class implements the method for changing the scene and for interacting with the preloader.
    IllegalActionException
    An exception that is thrown every time someone is trying to perform an action he is not allowed to.
    Images
    A class that offers static attributes we frequently use to update the GUI
    InfoButton
    button for displaying information on actions that the player can do during his action
    JsonQueue
    Main class for creating a bridge between the gui and the server.
    JsonRegex
    This class handles the terminal user input parsing.
    JsonUtility
    This class offers some static auxiliary method used in the view.
    LoginException  
    LoginScreen
    Login screen for inserting the player's id.
    MaxTargetsException
    It is thrown when there are too many targets in the target list, so the effect cannot be executed.
    Model
    This class holds all the logic of the game.
    Notifications
    main class for showing and creating notifications
    OwnerNotActiveException
    It is thrown when the owner of a card is not the active player and is trying to use it.
    PlasmaGunTest
    Tests PlasmaGun, with a test method for every effect it has.
    Player
    The class representing a player of the match.
    PointHandler
    main class for counting all the points each player deserves after a kill or at the end of the game , the main method of this class is called at the end of each turn.
    PointsOfDeath
    class for representing the reward points for helping kill a player
    PointSorter
    class for sorting the player's contribute in killing a player
    PointStructure
    structure that every player has when making damage to another player .
    PowerUpCard
    The power up class to model the power up and offer methods to execute its effects.
    PowerUpCard.PowerUpCardBuilder  
    PowerUpDeck
    The deck of power ups.
    PowerUpDeck.PowerUpDeckBuilder  
    Presenter
    The presenter of the Model - Passive View - Presenter pattern.
    PropertiesAnalyzer
    This class analyzes the properties of every effect when it needs to be executed.
    PropertiesException
    An Exception that is related to a violated property.
    RmiConnection
    This class handles the RMI connection between the view and the server.
    RmiPresenter
    Rmi extension of the Presenter (it implements ita abstract methods): The presenter of the Model - Passive View - Presenter pattern.
    RocketLauncherTest
    Tests RocketLauncher, with a test method for every effect it has.
    Room
    Class of the Room.
    SameAsFatherException
    It is thrown when a target of an optional effect should have been the same target of the base effect but it's not.
    SameAsPlayerException
    It is thrown when the target should have been the same of the owner of the card that is being used but it's not.
    Server
    The Server class.
    SocketConnection
    This class handles the socket connection between the view and the server.
    SocketPresenter
    Socket extension of the Presenter (it implements ita abstract methods): The presenter of the Model - Passive View - Presenter pattern.
    SpawnException  
    SpriteAnimation
    animation composing the explosion in the explosion animation
    Square
    The Square class.
    SquareDistanceException
    It is thrown when an effect is trying to be executed on a target that is in a square too far away or too close to the player.
    SquareException
    It is thrown when the player's trying to collect in the wrong square.
    StateHandler
    Updates the state of the gui
    Target
    The interface for the targets with basic method implementation for the possible targets of effects.
    TargetType
    An enum to differentiate target types directly.
    TargetTypeException
    It is thrown when someone's trying to execute an effect on a wrong target type.
    TargetViewException
    It is thrown when someone's trying to execute an effect on a target he should see but can't, or vice versa.
    Terminal
    This class is the virtual terminal used to separate input and output streams on the real terminal.
    View
    This class contains the view screens.
    VirtualAccessPoint
    The interface for the connection.
    VirtualPresenter
    The interface that declares all the methods that the Presenter must have.
    VirtualView
    The interface that declares all the method that the view must have.
    VortexCannonTest
    Tests VortexCannon, with a test method for every effect it has.
    WeaponCard
    The weapon card class to model the weapon card and offer methods to execute its effects.
    WeaponCard.WeaponCardBuilder  
    WeaponDeck
    The deck of weaponCards.
    WeaponDeck.WeaponDeckBuilder
